text.description: In grounds of almost three-quarters of an acre with far-reaching views over fields to the rear, this very spacious family home dates, we are told, from the 1950's and was substantially added to in the 1980's. There is now accommodation which has the flexibility to be used as one large house or as a house with up to two annexes.

Two Bedrooms
Lounge
Dining Room
Kitchen
Bathroom
Gas Central Heating
UPVC Double Glazing
Rear Garden
An internal inspection is highly recommended
text.charges: 75 years left on Lease Lease costs £150 PA Service charge £70 pm

feature.heading: Utility Room
feature.description: 8.00m x 7.00m (26' 3" x 23' ) Laminated worktop, boiler for the central heating and domestic hot water.

feature.heading: Entrance Hall
feature.description: Where there is a radiator, dado rail, coved ceiling and understairs cupboard.

feature.heading: Dining Room
feature.description: 15' 11" x 11' 11" (4.85m x 3.63m) Has patterned ceiling cornice, radiator and double-glazed a sliding double-glazed door to the patio.

feature.heading: Lounge
feature.description: 19' 11" x 11' 11" (6.07m x 3.63m) Features a restored deep-moulded solid marble French fireplace surround to a gas coal-effect real-flame fire, radiator, dado rail and coved ceiling. To the front there is a sealed unit double-glazed window overlooking the front garden.

feature.heading: Kitchen\diner
feature.description: Has a very smart kitchen by Aspect, including cream-finished Shaker-style units with polished granite worktops and including an extensive range of wall cupboards as well as base cupboards and drawers. There is a 5-ring integrated gas hob with a stainless steel chimney hood over, integrated stainless steel sinks and granite drainer, integrated dishwasher and a high level Neff double oven. To the front a sealed unit double-glazed window overlooks the front garden and at the rear there is ample space for a breakfast table and chairs with outlook through the double-glazed sliding doors with view over the rear gardens and fields beyond.

feature.heading: Landing
feature.description: With a radiator coved ceiling, loft access and a sealed unit double-glazed window as well as a shelved linen cupboard.

feature.heading: Bedroom One
feature.description: Features an extensive range of fitted wardrobes with a coved ceiling, radiators, door to the En-suite and double-glazed sliding patio doors opening to the full-house-width balcony.

feature.heading: Bedroom Two
feature.description: Again features an extensive range of fitted wardrobes and corner display shelving as well as built-in wardrobes with floor-to-ceiling sliding mirrored doors. There is a coved ceiling, radiator and sliding double-glazed doors opening to the balcony.

feature.heading: Bathroom
feature.description: Which has a white suite comprising a panelled bath with shower and shower screen over, pedestal basin and low-level w.c. Ceramic floor and wall tiling, radiator and a sealed unit double-glazed window.

feature.heading: Front Garden
feature.description: Screened from the road and measures approximately 92' frontage to the road and features a large driveway with parking for several vehicles.

feature.heading: Rear Garden
feature.description: Overall the plot's depth is approximately 260' to the right-hand side and 273' to the left with orchard fruit trees, a very old and beautiful cherry tree and extensive lawns, flowerbeds, shrubs etc. There are rural views to the rear also.

feature.heading: Garage
feature.description: Large double garage to the side/rear of the house.
